hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that plundering #the Thieves' Hideout# is a foolish choice.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #the Sacred Forest Meadow# is on the way of the hero.

DMT (Biggoron).text: I heard @ is pretty good at Zelda.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that ##inside Ganon's Castle## has #0# major items.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #the Bottom of the Well# hoards #an Odd Mushroom#.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well Front Left Fake Wall Chest

GC (Maze).text: They say that a #giant pot in the Shadow Temple# holds #a Small Key#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that #the Ice Cavern# hoards #the Minuet of Forest#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #the Requiem of Spirit#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that #the Deku Tree# hoards #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that #Lon Lon Ranch# is on the path to #the Key#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that a #storm near the castle# reveals a #generic grotto#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that in a grotto with a #spider and a cow# you will find...^ #a Recovery Heart# and #a Water Temple Compass#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that Zelda's Lullaby can be used to repair broken signs.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that ##Dodongo's Cavern## has #0# major items.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that ##the Water Temple## has #1# major item.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that obtaining the #underwater silver rupees in Gerudo Training Ground# rewards #a Small Key#.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Underwater Silver Rupee Chest

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that #a Deku Stick# can be found at #Gerudo's Fortress#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that past a #silver block in the Spirit Temple# boulders and a melody conceal...^ #a Small Key# and #a Small Key#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple Early Adult Right Chest

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that paying a #fee to the Gerudos# grants access to #the Bottom of the Well#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Graveyard# is on the path to the #Goron Ruby#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that a #village well# leads to #the Ice Cavern#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that #Hyrule Castle# is on the path of #time#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that Anju needs to stop losing her chickens.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that the #Shadow Trial# was dispelled by Sheik.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that plundering #inside Ganon's Castle# is a foolish choice.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that #Magic Beans# can be found in #the Death Mountain Crater#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that #the Gerudo Card# can be found on #the Death Mountain Trail#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #the Requiem of Spirit#.

SFM (Saria).text: Did you know that Gorons understood SRM long before speedrunners did?

ToT (Left).text: They say that a #spider behind a muddy wall# in a grotto holds #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that a #fractured desert wall# hides #Saria's House#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that #the Sun's Song# can be found in #Hyrule Field#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that #Kakariko Village# is on the path to #the Tower#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that #the Water Temple# is on the way of the hero.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that a #cow in Gerudo Valley# gifts #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that the #Desert Colossus# sands echo with #the Bolero of Fire#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that #a Gold Skulltula Token# can be found in #the Lost Woods#.
hinted_locations: LW GS Bean Patch Near Theater

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that plundering #Dodongo's Cavern# is a foolish choice.
